channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins -- all products

item.title: CVE-2012-4440|2024-08-06T20:35:09.863Z -- jenkins -- jenkins
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) in Jenkins main before 1.482 and LTS before 1.466.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML in the Violations plugin.

item.title: CVE-2012-4438|2024-08-06T20:35:09.455Z -- jenkins -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins main before 1.482 and LTS before 1.466.2 allows remote attackers with read access and HTTP access to Jenkins master to insert data and execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2012-4441|2024-08-06T20:35:09.854Z -- jenkins -- jenkins
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) in Jenkins main before 1.482 and LTS before 1.466.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML in the CI game plugin.

item.title: CVE-2012-4439|2024-08-06T20:35:09.695Z -- jenkins -- jenkins
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) in Jenkins main before 1.482 and LTS before 1.466.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted URL that points to Jenkins.
